header.title: How To - a look inside configuring your site.

section.title: Introduction
section.p: Intended Audience: For those that Administer their Apache Forrest instances, and for developers. Other areas of this example site are intended to give examples to users of sites such as this.

The aims of this How To section is to show you how you can alter your site configuration files to enable, disable and enhance the site to suit your needs. We'll also show how you can alter 'themes' and 'plugins'.
